lines.text: No, but it's usually a pretty good guess.

[to Prospero]
I though I'd find you here. It's time to come home, my son.
You've changed...yes, you've been reborn. Just as I anticipated, you were amongst the meat you could not resist, and now, we'll be together.
[he tries to attack Caliban, but Caliban easily grabs and disarms him, tossing his sword aside then shoving him away.]
Your heart's not in this, boy.
[unknown to him, Jack Deth sneaks up, and takes Prospero's sword.]
